title: Massive Hiring Spree: South Korean Giants to Create 60,000 Jobs by 2029
description: Samsung and other major South Korean conglomerates will hire 60,000 employees by 2029 to address youth unemployment and boost the economy. The initiative aligns with governmental efforts to create jobs for young people, focusing on high-demand sectors such as semiconductors, biotechnology, and artificial intelligence.
content: South Korea's corporate landscape is set for a seismic shift as Samsung Group, alongside other major conglomerates, plans a massive hiring spree. The initiative aims to mitigate the nation's severe youth unemployment crisis and stimulate economic gro... [818 chars]

title: Lahore Police launch cutting-edge AI system for crime prediction
description: LAHORE  -  Lahore Police have started using a modern artificial intelligence (AI) system to predict crimes and take effective action. Punjab Safe City
content: LAHORE - Lahore Police have started using a modern artificial intelligence (AI) system to predict crimes and take effective action. Punjab Safe City Authority has launched the “Punjab Emergency AI” software in this regard. PSCA sources told APP that ... [382 chars]

title: ChatGPT Helped Me Ace Finals While Sleeping More
description: The Study Revolution That Saved My GPA ChatGPT transformed Emma Thompson’s finals disaster into her best semester grades while she maintained 8 hours of sleep nightly. The psychology major discovered that Artificial Intelligence could optimize her study sessions better than any productivity technique she’d tried. title: New AI tool predicts risk of over 1,000 diseases in advance: Report

content:
A new artificial intelligence (AI) tool is capable of predicting an individual’s risk of more than 1,000 diseases, in some instances projecting outcomes decades into the future, according to a recent study published on Wednesday.

title: Gen AI and Geoscience Research at EarthSense 2025
description: New Delhi [India], September 19: Hyderabad witnessed a defining moment in global research and innovation as KLH Aziz Nagar Campus proudly hosted the IEEE International Conference on Next-Gen Technologies of Artificial Intelligence and Geoscience Remote Sensing - EarthSense 2025. Held from 16th to 18th September 2025, the international gathering positioned KLH at the forefront of interdisciplinary collaboration, bringing together scientists, researchers, and industry leaders from around the world.

title: India picks 8 firms, including IIT Bombay, to build a massive 1-trillion parametre AI model
description: India’s artificial intelligence mission is moving into its next big phase. The government has named eight organisations, including IIT Bombay, Tech Mahindra and Fractal Analytics, to build foundational large language models (LLMs) under the IndiaAI Mission.

title: Trump's AI plan supports antitrust enforcement, DOJ official says
description: U.S. antitrust enforcers are on guard against anticompetitive behaviour in the artificial intelligence sector, a Department of Justice official said.
content:
U.S. antitrust enforcers are on guard against anticompetitive behaviour in the artificial intelligence sector as part of the Trump administration's plan to cement U.S. AI dominance, a Department of Justice official said in New York on Thursday.
